EMICaution.speech: I would like to inform you that your E M I due for the month of 5th September of an amount of Rs 12495. Please confirm if you have sufficient balance in your account for clearance ?
EMICaution.text: I would like to inform you that your E M I for the month is due on <date>05 Sep</date>. Please confirm if you have sufficient balance in your account for clearance ?

AskPaymentDate.speech: When will you be funding your account? Today? Tomorrow ? else please specify a date?
AskPaymentDate.text: When will you be funding your account? Today? Tomorrow ? else please specify a date?

ThankYouPenaltyInfoExit.speech: Thankyou for your response. Request you to please update your account at the earliest else delay will lead to a bounce charge of Rs 350 and further delay in EMI payment can lead to levy of penalty as well. Hope you understand
ThankYouPenaltyInfoExit.text: Thankyou for your response. Request you to please update your account at the earliest else delay will lead to an accrual of a bounce charge of Rs 350 and further delay in EMI payment can lead to levy of penalty as well. Hope you understand
